      • checkInventoryExistence

        public static int checkInventoryExistence(java.sql.PreparedStatement selectRow_InventoryRecord,
                                          java.lang.String SKU)
                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        DML function to check Inventory
        Parameters:
        selectRow_InventoryRecord - Prepared statement to pass in
        SKU - The SKU of the inventory
        Returns:
        count of inventory If 0, nothing in stock. -1 means doesn't exist. Any positive integer represents the stock amount.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Potential SQL exception
